headline: Charter to Participate in Liberty Media Corporation's Annual Investor Meeting
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHTR) (along with its subsidiaries, "Charter") today announced that Christopher Winfrey, President and Chief Executive Officer, will participate in Liberty Media Corporation's annual Investor Meeting in New York, New York on Thursday, November 14, 2024. Mr. Winfrey's remarks are scheduled to begin at approximately 1:40 p.m. ET. Mr. Winfrey will also participate in a Q&A session beginning at approximately 2:30 p.m. ET.
